thread.title: Phil O

author: Phil O
title: Phil O
text: Shopped around on the net and the price is very keen especially when you consider that the work is done at your place. I booked a time slot and the fitter showed up early which worked fine for me. Two new tyres were fitted without hassle and everything sorted in 30 minutes. The fitter was a nice friendly chap who worked hard. Frankly, I couldn't ask for more. Would use again.
